name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** pipelines to deliver high-performance cloud-based solutions. Proficient in **GitOps** methodologies, I leverage **Python** and **Bash** scripting to optimize DevOps processes and enhance cloud security. My extensive background in infrastructure automation and configuration management has enabled me to successfully implement scalable solutions that align with industry best practices.

Adept in cultivating collaborative environments by implementing SRE principles, I ensure seamless operations through continuous monitoring and proactive problem resolution. My technical skill set is complemented by rich experience in developing secure applications in compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. With a solid understanding of Groovy scripting, I also bring a strategic approach to process improvement and team efficiency.
